00056 void cObj2OGL::freeMemory()
00057 {
00058     delete [] vertices;
00059     delete [] textures;
00060     delete [] normals;

00073 int cObj2OGL::makeObjectFromObjFile(QString str)
00074 {
00075     QFile objFile(str);
00076     if(!objFile.exists()) return 0;
00077 
00078     /* First pass - Count vertices and faces. */
00079     if(!objFile.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly)) return 0;
00080 
00081     // its important to zero these before while loop
00082     numVertices = 0; 
00083     numNormals = 0;
00084     numFaces = 0;
00085     QRegExp regV("^v\\s.*");
00086     QRegExp regF("^f\\s.*");
00087     QString line;
00088     while (!objFile.atEnd())
00089     {
00090         line = objFile.readLine();
00091         if(line.contains(regV)) numVertices++;
00092         else if(line.contains(regF)) numFaces++;
00093     }
00094 
00095     objFile.close();
00096 
00097     /* Second pass - Now when numbers of vertices and faces are known create
00098        arrays and feed them with values from object file.*/
00099     if(!objFile.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly)) return 0;
00100 
00101     vertices = new sPoint3[numVertices];
00102     normals = new sPoint3[numVertices];
00103     faces = new QList<sFace>[numFaces];
00104 
00105     for(int i=0; i < numVertices; i++)
00106     {
00107         normals[i].x = 0.0;
00108         normals[i].y = 0.0;
00109         normals[i].z = 0.0;
00110     }
00111 
00112     int i = 0;
00113     int j = 0;
00114     QStringList tempLineSegments;
00115     QStringList tempFaceSegments;
00116     sPoint3 tempPoint;
00117     sFace tempFace;
00118     while(i < numVertices || j < numFaces)
00119     {
00120         line = objFile.readLine();
00121         if(line.contains(regV))
00122         {
00123             tempLineSegments = line.split(" ");
00124             vertices[i].x = tempLineSegments.at(1).toFloat();
00125             vertices[i].y = tempLineSegments.at(2).toFloat();
00126             vertices[i].z = tempLineSegments.at(3).toFloat();
00127             i++;
00128         } else if(line.contains(regF))
00129         {
00130             tempLineSegments = line.split(" ");
00131             for(int k = 1; k < tempLineSegments.size(); k++)
00132             {
00133                 tempFaceSegments = tempLineSegments.at(k).split("/");
00134                 tempFace.vertIndex = tempFaceSegments.at(0).toInt()-1;
00135                 tempFace.normIndex = tempFaceSegments.at(0).toInt()-1;
00136                 faces[j].append(tempFace);
00137 
00138             }
00139             tempPoint = computeFaceNormal(faces[j].at(0).vertIndex, \
00140                                           faces[j].at(1).vertIndex, \
00141                                           faces[j].at(2).vertIndex);
00142             for(int k = 0; k < faces[j].size(); k++)
00143             {
00144                 normals[faces[j].at(k).vertIndex].x += tempPoint.x;
00145                 normals[faces[j].at(k).vertIndex].y += tempPoint.y;
00146                 normals[faces[j].at(k).vertIndex].z += tempPoint.z;
00147             }
00148 
00149             j++;
00150         }
00151     }
00152 
00153     objFile.close();
00154 
00155     normalizeVertexNormals();
00156 
00157     bParsed = true;
00158 
00159     return 1;
00160 }

00171 int cObj2OGL::makeObjectFromObjFileWithNormals(QString str,
00172                                                QProgressBar * progress_bar,
00173                                                QLabel * progress_label)
00174 {
00175     QFile objFile(str);
00176     if(!objFile.exists()) return 0;
00177 
00178     /* First pass - Count vertices and faces. */
00179     if(!objFile.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly)) return 0;
00180 
00181     // its important to zero these before while loop
00182     numVertices = 0;
00183     numTextures = 0;
00184     numNormals = 0;
00185     numFaces = 0;
00186     QRegExp regV("^v\\s.*");
00187     QRegExp regT("^vt\\s.*");
00188     QRegExp regN("^vn\\s.*");
00189     QRegExp regF("^f\\s.*");
00190     QString line;
00191     while (!objFile.atEnd())
00192     {
00193         line = objFile.readLine();
00194         if(line.contains(regV)) numVertices++;
00195         else if(line.contains(regT)) numTextures++;
00196             else if(line.contains(regN)) numNormals++;
00197                 else if(line.contains(regF)) numFaces++;
00198     }
00199 
00200     objFile.close();
00201 
00202     /* Second pass - Now when numbers of vertices and faces are known create
00203        arrays and feed them with values from object file.
00204        This operation takes some time so progress bar will be displayed.*/
00205     if(!objFile.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly)) return 0;
00206 
00207     vertices = new sPoint3[numVertices];
00208     textures = new sPoint3[numTextures];
00209     normals = new sPoint3[numNormals];
00210     faces = new QList<sFace>[numFaces];
00211 
00212     if(progress_bar != NULL)
00213         progress_bar->setRange(0, numVertices+numTextures+numNormals+numFaces);
00214     if(progress_label != NULL)
00215     {
00216         progress_label->setText(str);
00217         progress_label->repaint();
00218     }
00219 
00220     /*for(int i=0; i < numVertices; i++)
00221     {
00222         normals[i].x = 0.0;
00223         normals[i].y = 0.0;
00224         normals[i].z = 0.0;
00225     }*/
00226 
00227     // its important to zero these before while loop
00228     int nV = 0;
00229     int nT = 0;
00230     int nN = 0;
00231     int nF = 0;
00232     QStringList tempLineSegments;
00233     QStringList tempFaceSegments;
00234     sFace tempFace;
00235     while(nV < numVertices || nT < numTextures || nN < numNormals ||
00236           nF < numFaces)
00237     {
00238 
00239         if(progress_bar != NULL)
00240         {
00241             //qApp->processEvents();
00242             progress_bar->setValue(nV+nT+nN+nF);
00243         }
00244 
00245         line = objFile.readLine();
00246         if(line.contains(regV))
00247         {
00248             tempLineSegments = line.split(" ");
00249             if(tempLineSegments.size() > 3)
00250             {
00251                 vertices[nV].x = tempLineSegments.at(1).toFloat();
00252                 vertices[nV].y = tempLineSegments.at(2).toFloat();
00253                 vertices[nV].z = tempLineSegments.at(3).toFloat();
00254             } else
00255             {
00256                 vertices[nV].x = 0.0;
00257                 vertices[nV].y = 0.0;
00258                 vertices[nV].z = 0.0;
00259             }
00260             nV++;
00261         } else
00262         if(line.contains(regT))
00263         {
00264             tempLineSegments = line.split(" ");
00265             if(tempLineSegments.size() > 2)
00266             {
00267                 textures[nT].x = tempLineSegments.at(1).toFloat();
00268                 textures[nT].y = tempLineSegments.at(2).toFloat();
00269                 textures[nT].z = 0.0;
00270                 if(tempLineSegments.size() > 3)
00271                     textures[nT].z = tempLineSegments.at(3).toFloat();
00272             } else
00273             {
00274                 textures[nT].x = 0.0;
00275                 textures[nT].y = 0.0;
00276                 textures[nT].z = 0.0;
00277             }
00278             nT++;
00279         } else
00280         if(line.contains(regN))
00281         {
00282             tempLineSegments = line.split(" ");
00283             if(tempLineSegments.size() > 3)
00284             {
00285                 normals[nN].x = tempLineSegments.at(1).toFloat();
00286                 normals[nN].y = tempLineSegments.at(2).toFloat();
00287                 normals[nN].z = tempLineSegments.at(3).toFloat();
00288             } else
00289             {
00290                 normals[nN].x = 1.0;
00291                 normals[nN].y = 0.0;
00292                 normals[nN].z = 0.0;
00293             }
00294             nN++;
00295         } else
00296         if(line.contains(regF))
00297         {
00298             tempLineSegments = line.split(" ");
00299             for(int i = 1; i < tempLineSegments.size(); i++)
00300             {
00301                 tempFaceSegments = tempLineSegments.at(i).split("/");
00302                 if(tempFaceSegments.size() == 3)
00303                 {
00304                     tempFace.vertIndex = tempFaceSegments.at(0).toInt()-1;
00305                     tempFace.textIndex = tempFaceSegments.at(1).toInt()-1;
00306                     tempFace.normIndex = tempFaceSegments.at(2).toInt()-1;
00307                     faces[nF].append(tempFace);
00308                 } else
00309                 {
00310                     tempFace.vertIndex = 0;
00311                     tempFace.textIndex = 0;
00312                     tempFace.normIndex = 0;
00313                     faces[nF].append(tempFace);
00314                 }
00315             }
00316             nF++;
00317         }
00318     }
00319 
00320     // end progress
00321     if(progress_bar != NULL)
00322         progress_bar->setValue(numVertices+numTextures+numNormals+numFaces);
00323 
00324     objFile.close();
00325 
00326     //normalizeVertexNormals();
00327 
00328     bParsed = true;
00329 
00330     return 1;
00331 }
00332 
00340 sPoint3 cObj2OGL::computeFaceNormal(int index0, int index1, int index2)
00341 {
00342     sPoint3 retPoint;
00343 
00344     float dx1 = vertices[index1].x - vertices[index0].x;
00345     float dy1 = vertices[index1].y - vertices[index0].y;
00346     float dz1 = vertices[index1].z - vertices[index0].z;
00347     float dx2 = vertices[index2].x - vertices[index0].x;
00348     float dy2 = vertices[index2].y - vertices[index0].y;
00349     float dz2 = vertices[index2].z - vertices[index0].z;
00350     retPoint.x = dy1*dz2 - dz1*dy2;
00351     retPoint.y = dz1*dx2 - dx1*dz2;
00352     retPoint.z = dx1*dy2 - dy1*dx2;
00353     float d = sqrt(retPoint.x*retPoint.x + retPoint.y*retPoint.y + \
00354                    retPoint.z*retPoint.z);
00355 
00356     if (d == 0.0)
00357     {
00358       retPoint.x = 1;
00359       retPoint.y = 0;
00360       retPoint.z = 0;
00361     }
00362     else
00363     {
00364       retPoint.x /= d;
00365       retPoint.y /= d;
00366       retPoint.z /= d;
00367     }
00368     return retPoint;
00369 }
00370 
00378 void cObj2OGL::normalizeVertexNormals()
00379 {
00380     float d;
00381     for(int i=0; i < numVertices; i++)
00382     {
00383      d = sqrt(normals[i].x*normals[i].x + normals[i].y*normals[i].y + \
00384               normals[i].z*normals[i].z);
00385 
00386       if (d == 0.0)
00387       {
00388         //normals[i].x = 1;
00389         //normals[i].y = 0;
00390         //normals[i].z = 0;
00391       }
00392       else
00393       {
00394         normals[i].x /= d;
00395         normals[i].y /= d;
00396         normals[i].z /= d;
00397       }
00398 
00399     }
00400 }
00401 
00412 GLuint cObj2OGL::createDisplayList()
00413 {
00414     if(!bParsed) return 0;
00415     if(vertices == NULL || normals == NULL) return 0;
00416     
00417     GLuint displayList = glGenLists(1);
00418     glNewList(displayList, GL_COMPILE);
00419 
00420     int indexV;
00421     //int indexT;
00422     int indexN;
00423     for(int i = 0; i < numFaces; i++)
00424     {
00425         if(faces[i].size() == 3) glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00426         else if (faces[i].size() == 4) glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00427         else glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
00428         for(int k = 0; k < faces[i].size(); k++)
00429         {
00430             indexV = faces[i].at(k).vertIndex;
00431             //indexT = faces[i].at(k).textIndex;
00432             indexN = faces[i].at(k).normIndex;
00433             glNormal3f(normals[indexN].x,
00434                        normals[indexN].y,
00435                        normals[indexN].z);
00436             glVertex3f(vertices[indexV].x,
00437                        vertices[indexV].y,
00438                        vertices[indexV].z);
00439         }
00440         glEnd();
00441     }
00442 
00443     glEndList();
00444 
00445     return displayList;
00446 }
